title: 【菜喳】女孩也懂男孩的Overwatch鬥陣特攻

json.text: this year, we don't have the video of " The Girls will understand the LOL that the boys played".
Let's talk about " The Girls will understand the Overwatch that the boys played"
Only for entertaiment
Overwatch is called dou zheng te gong in Taiwan
and they called it " shou wang xian feng" in China ( two different name in mandarin)
is developed and tested by Blizzard Entertainment on 5/5/2016
officially published on 5/24/2016 and this is a first-person shooter video game
although this game is only published for 1 month but a lots of website thinks highly of this game
but if i give so much praises for this game from the opening of this video
the viewers must feel like
okay~ this is a commercial video
NO
So please calm down and listen to me
These are my points
if LOL is a kind of killing and battle arena video game
then Overwatch is a killing and pushing cars video game
So why is push cars? i will explain it later
as a FPS game
what is the difference between Overwatch and other games that let it to be so attractive
First u need to note about the FPS the i said just now
not only represent the word First person shooter
but also the 3 things that u need to do in the games
it is to find a car that ran out of gas
Push it
and also shoot the people who come around
We can say this is a game that classified under a shooting game
but the players use most of their time to push cars in this game
honestly, if u pay attention and play the game for 10-20 rounds
or u open the official website of Blizzard Entertainment and go through the introduction
there are half of the maps that related to the "push car"
we had told u that the petroleum will run out in the future
now the Blizzard Entertainment had told u also
before the new mode is develope
besides shooting and killing people
most of the time we were pushing the car
so until now, here is the question
why is a push car video game is so popular among the boys?
and what is the games experiences that make the girls complain about it
because their boyfriend like to pushing a car rather than pushing them?
this will bring us to the main features of this game
The game characters
Basically, the normal FPS will have a fixed character and u only allowed to change the weapon while playing the game
but u can change the character and also the weapon and the skill in Overwatch
if u want to refute my words then u should  think carefully
u can't see the look of the characters in the 99% of the times when u playing the game
and u tell me that the aim for u to play the game is to watch your characters?
according to wiki
Blizzard Entertainment use the setting of individual, race
and also the gender differences or no gender differences, i also don't know
creates many different characters that are unique and full of personality
u can see from here, they have
Soldier
cowboy (Mccree)
ninja
dwarf
robot
korean
tracer
gorilla , mice?
pig
and also What the
the differences between all the  hero are staright forward
all mans looks fierce
and the girls look cute
if u don't know this is a boy for girl
i also don't know!
Besides that
u also can guess about the weapon that it use according to the look and outfit of the hero
for example, this masked Tom Cruise
u can guess out that he will use Submachine gun with your knee without 1 second
and this man which didn't shave and wear his shirt nicely
erm, yes he is using a bow
and here is a 37 years old women with mercy face
her name is mercy
if i listed them out one by one is a video
50 minutes are also not enough for me
so if there is another episode for this
we only talk funny about other hero again
but
from the settings that we can observe now
there are many settings which make the players feel curious
why Zarya will look like a male when the female characters are so little in the game?
When u type Zarya in the google, she is the only female character that the "h" will not appear in her related word
no matter u use mandarin or English
besides that, why is the gorilla will have a myopia?
why she won't if she wear like this in the desert?
why is this character looks like my friend?
why is the fairy that spread peace will dress up like a devil?
but i like it
they have created aroound 20 hero until now
there are many setting and stories between the hero
if u are interested, u can search dragons and alive in the youtube
in conclusion, Overwatch is a game with a unique hero
huge background stories and the setting  and world wide that different with other video games
i believe that Blizzard Entertainment will tell us more and more about
the stories about this game
about the love and hate between the hero
we also excited about the next mode without the mission of pushing car  which will publish by Blizzard Entertainment
if we still have to push car again
the we will go back and talk about
"The Girls will understand the LOL that the boys played" part 5
